metadata.title: Movement of Hair Flexi-Brush - Alternating Nylon and Boar Flutes with Ceramic Tips - Smooths and Polishes

categorization.explanation: The product is a hair brush, which is a tool used for hair styling. Therefore, it fits best under the 'Hair Styling Accessories' subcategory of 'Hair Care' in the 'Beauty & Personal Care' main category.
